quotes.quote: Never trust the advice of a man in difficulties.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: It is very difficult to live among people you love and hold back from offering them advice.
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: People who ask our advice almost never take it. Yet we should never refuse to give it, upon request, for it often helps us to see our own way more clearly.
quotes.author: Brendan Francis

quotes.quote: Ask advice only of your equals.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Please give me some good advice in your next letter. I promise not to follow it.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: Don't give advice. It will come back and bite you in the [butt]. Don't take anyone's advice. So, my advice to you is to be true to yourself and everything will be fine.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Write down the advice of him who loves you, though you like it not at present.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Advice is what we ask for when we already know the answer but wish we didn't.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Good advice is something a man gives when he is too old to set a bad example.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Never give advice unless asked.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Some people like my advice so much that they frame it upon the wall instead of using it.
quotes.author: Gordon R. Dickson

quotes.quote: There is no human problem which could not be solved if people would simply do as I advise.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: The true secret of giving advice is, after you have honestly given it, to be perfectly indifferent whether it is taken or not, and never persist in trying to set people right.
quotes.author: Hannah Whitall Smith

quotes.quote: I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: The only thing to do with good advice is pass it on. It is never any use to oneself.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Don't try to solve serious matters in the middle of the night.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: The advice of friends must be received with a judicious reserve; we must not give ourselves up to it and follow it blindly, whether right or wrong.
quotes.author: Pierre Charron

quotes.quote: Many receive advice, few profit by it.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Advice is very easy to give, and even easier not to follow, so I don't fool with it.
quotes.author: Sidney J. Harris

quotes.quote: It seems that bad advice that's fun will always be better known than than good advice that's dull-no matter how useless that fun advice is.
quotes.author: Solon

quotes.quote: Never take the advice of someone who has not had your kind of trouble.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: In giving advice, seek to help, not please, your friend.
quotes.author: Wil Wheaton

quotes.quote: Never advise anyone to go to war or to marry.
Don't be a dick!
